Section.Paragraph: We will present a new model of grammar documentation which exploits the potentialities of an hypertextual representation of lingware. As we will show this model insures the following benefits: * Constant coherence between the documentation and the various pieces of linguistic information.
* Valuable organization of the linguistic knowledge, in order to increase the productivity of the grammar writer.
* Possibility of sharing grammatical resources and related documentation with other sites in a completely intuitive way.
